commentBody:
The big questions for football fans and the gambling industry are:

How will Brady, Belichick, the Patriots cheat in their game with Kansas?

When will this round of cheating be exposed, during or after the game?

What punishment will the NFL impose this time, given the Patriots' extensive history of cheating?

Will the Patriots appeal their new NFL punishment in federal court?

What evidence will Brady and Belichick destroy this time to cover their cheating?

The most important NFL record Brady, Belichick and the Patriots hold is the most prolific history of cheating and cover up. Not good for the game, not good for the NFL.
